title: EvoDevo Papers: a literature bot for evolutionary developmental biology
description: EvoDevo Papers is a literature bot for evolutionary developmental biology. It keeps track of newly-published scientific articles in the field and shares them on various social media accounts with a slight hint of randomness, providing a great way to follow the latest publications or discover new works on EvoDevo. All the content is browsable and searchable on the website: evodevo.brunovellutini.com"

creators.name: Vellutini, Bruno C.
affiliation: Max Planck Institute of Molecular Cell Biology and Genetics
